00013 #ifndef __inline__
00014 #ifdef WIN32 && defined _MSC_VER
00015 #define __inline__      __inline
00016 #else
00017 #define __inline__      inline
00018 #endif
00019 #endif
00020 
00021 //assume 'portable' has 64bit long called 'long long'
00022 //this is standard gcc
00023 //it would be cool if I could use 32 bit ints only...
00024 //typedef int64 long long;
00025 
00026 __inline__ int fixedmul(int x,int y)
00027 {
00028         int64 d=x;
00029  d*=y;
00030  d>>=16;
00031  return (int)d;
00032 }
00033 
00034 __inline__ int fixeddiv(int x,int y)
00035 {
00036         int64 d=x;
00037  d<<=16;
00038  if (y) d/=y;
00039  return (int)d;
00040 }
